data.lyric:
[ti:Rearview Town]
[ar:Jason Aldean]
[al:Rearview Town]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Rearview Town - Jason Aldean (杰森·阿尔丁)
[00:08.66]Written by：Kelley Lovelace/Neil Thrasher/Bobby Pinson
[00:17.32]Wipe the footprints off my dash
[00:20.51]Tore up those sun-faded photographs
[00:23.77]Threw 'em in the wind ya'll can have it back
[00:26.96]
[00:28.25]I'm outta here
[00:29.37]
[00:30.44]I stuck my middle finger up in the sky
[00:33.93]Flipped off that ya'll come back sign
[00:37.35]Looked in the mirror one last time
[00:40.58]
[00:41.36]And watched it disappear
[00:42.92]
[00:44.46]It ain't nothin' but a rearview town
[00:47.80]Broken hearts and rusted plows
[00:51.18]Roots ripped right up out of the ground
[00:54.04]
[00:54.87]Never thought I'd ever leave it
[00:57.91]It ain't nothin' what it used to be
[01:01.22]Population minus me
[01:04.57]On the other side of that dust cloud
[01:07.70]
[01:08.32]Ain't nothin' but a rearview town
[01:13.16]
[01:17.97]I could tough it out but what's the use
[01:21.53]A place that small it's hard to do
[01:24.75]Too much of her to run into
[01:28.39]And so much road to somewhere new
[01:31.71]It ain't nothin' but a rearview town
[01:35.12]Broken hearts and rusted plows
[01:38.48]Roots ripped right up out of the ground
[01:42.13]Never thought I'd ever leave it
[01:44.55]
[01:45.16]It ain't nothin' what it used to be
[01:48.55]Population minus me
[01:51.84]On the other side of that dust cloud
[01:55.03]
[01:55.75]Ain't nothin' but a rearview town
[02:00.36]
[02:12.33]It ain't nothin' but yesterday
[02:15.60]One less truck rollin' down main
[02:18.74]
[02:19.40]Ain't nothin' left to say
[02:22.91]
[02:25.85]It ain't nothin' what it used to be
[02:29.14]Population minus me
[02:32.15]On the other side of that dust cloud
[02:35.40]
[02:36.34]Ain't nothin' but a rearview town
[02:43.09]Ain't nothin' but a rearview town
data.trans:
[ti:Rearview Town]
[ar:Jason Aldean]
[al:Rearview Town]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:08.66]//
[00:17.32]擦拭冲撞后留下的痕迹
[00:20.51]撕毁褪色的照片
[00:23.77]让它们随风而去 你们都将重新拥有
[00:26.96]
[00:28.25]我选择退出
[00:29.37]
[00:30.44]对天空竖起中指
[00:33.93]十指摊开 你们还会变得如从前那样
[00:37.35]最后一次看向后视镜
[00:40.58]
[00:41.36]看着一切消失
[00:42.92]
[00:44.46]不至于一无所有 还有后视镜里的城镇
[00:47.80]还有破碎的心灵和斑驳的土地
[00:51.18]植物在土里生根发芽
[00:54.04]
[00:54.87]从未想过有一天会离开
[00:57.91]一切都已经物是人非
[01:01.22]我从这里离开
[01:04.57]去到乌云的另一边
[01:07.70]
[01:08.32]不至于一无所有 还有后视镜里的城镇
[01:13.16]
[01:17.97]即使咬牙坚持 又有什么用
[01:21.53]地方太小 已没有我的容身之地
[01:24.75]她总是无处不在
[01:28.39]有太多的路去到新的地方
[01:31.71]不至于一无所有 还有后视镜里的城镇
[01:35.12]破碎的心灵和斑驳的土地
[01:38.48]植物在土里生根发芽
[01:42.13]从未想过有一天会离开
[01:44.55]
[01:45.16]一切都已经物是人非
[01:48.55]我从这里离开
[01:51.84]去到乌云的另一边
[01:55.03]
[01:55.75]不至于一无所有
[02:00.36]
[02:12.33]一切都已经变为昨天
[02:15.60]街道上少了我的身影
[02:18.74]
[02:19.40]无数的话语要说
[02:22.91]
[02:25.85]一切都已经物是人非
[02:29.14]我从这里离开
[02:32.15]去到乌云的另一边
[02:35.40]
[02:36.34]不至于一无所有
[02:43.09]不至于一无所有
